# MassHunteR

<!-- badges: start -->
[![Lifecycle: experimental](https://img.shields.io/badge/lifecycle-experimental-orange.svg)](https://lifecycle.r-lib.org/articles/stages.html#experimental)
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of MassHunteR is to merge several result files from MassHunter Qual into one Excel file, where on each row there is a data row and each column is a peak.

## Installation

You can install MassHunteR like so:

``` r
remotes::install_github("ricoderks/MassHunteR")
```
